mapper.select: select * from notice order by notice_no asc
mapper.update: update notice set notice_hits = notice_hits + 1 where notice_no=#{notice_no}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (user_no, notice_date, notice_title, notice_desc, notice_file, notice_hits) values(#{user_no}, sysdate(), #{notice_title}, #{notice_desc}, #{notice_file}, 0)
